content.raw: Ok thanks @sringer99. I'm a bit confused as to why those delays need to be so long, because the processes that are being waited for are pretty quick to spin up. Only guess I have is it's something to do with roslaunch or maybe your computer in general? Anywho, i'll extend those wait times and work them into our next release. Thanks for taking the time to debug a bit!
content.html: Ok thanks @sringer99. I'm a bit confused as to why those delays need to be so long, because the processes that are being waited for are pretty quick to spin up. Only guess I have is it's something to do with roslaunch or maybe your computer in general? Anywho, i'll extend those wait times and work them into our next release.
